section:
You enter a glade where an old tree has toppled. Beetles scurry across it, burrowing into the dead wood, and a profusion of brightly stained flowers have taken root in the bark. On all sides of the clearing there are saplings stretching hopefully up towards the bare patch of sky, engaged in a slow, silent and deadly competition to be the fallen tree’s replacement.
Press on across the clearing Turn back and find another route
